meanings.definition: A person or machine that labels items.
meanings.sent1: The labeller put stickers on all the jars.
meanings.sent2: The labeller at the factory works quickly to tag the products.
meanings.sent3: The labeller accidentally labeled the wrong box, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: She was a human labeller, marking each item with care and precision.
meanings.sent5: The labeller, like a diligent bee, buzzed around the room tagging everything in sight.

meanings.definition: To attach a label to something.
meanings.sent1: Please labeller the boxes before shipping them out.
meanings.sent2: I labellered the folders to keep them organized.
meanings.sent3: He labellered his friend as the 'king of jokes' after a funny prank.
meanings.sent4: The artist labellered her paintings with unique symbols.
meanings.sent5: She labellered the map with colorful markers to show different routes clearly.
